revised_title: Toxicology and the Effects of Vegetable Poisons on the Animal System
tldr: The author conducted experiments to understand how certain vegetable poisons affect the animal system, particularly the brain and nervous system. They discovered that some poisons, like spirits and essential oils, can cause immediate effects on the brain through the nervous system without being absorbed into the circulation. The experiments also showed the similarities between the effects of poison and brain injuries, leading to further inquiry into the relationship between these two factors.
